description: A Hot Toddy is a drink that is best served warm during the&nbsp;winter. This cocktail combines your choice of brown liquor, honey, lemon juice and boiling water for an invigorating drink to take the edge off of cold weather. Unlike the&nbsp;Hot Bourbon Toddy which only uses bourbon, this recipe can be made with any type of liquor you like best!
keywords: How To Make Classic Hot Toddy
name: Classic Hot Toddy
recipeIngredient: 1 ½ oz. Brown liquor such as brandy, whiskey, or rum
Lemon wedge, cinnamon stick, and star anise, for garnish (optional)

recipeInstructions.name: Combine the first four ingredients in a warmed mug.
